dcterms:creator: Y. Yan
L. Li
dcterms:description: Avazu dataset is from kaggle competition in 2015. Avazu provided 10 days of click-through data. We use 21 features in total for modeling. All the features in this dataset are categorical features.
dcterms:title: Avazu

dcterms:creator: A. Beutel
P. Covington
S. Jain
C. Xu
J. Li
V. Gatto
E. H Chi
dcterms:description: Criteo dataset is from Kaggle competition in 2014. Criteo AI Lab officially released this dataset after, for academic use. This dataset contains 13 numerical features and 26 categorical features. We discretize all the numerical features to integers by transformation function and treat them as categorical features.
dcterms:title: Criteo

dcterms:creator: W. Zhang
S. Yuan
J. Wang
X. Shen
dcterms:description: iPinYou dataset is from iPinYou Global RTB (Real-Time Bidding) Bidding Algorithm Competition in 2013. We follow the data processing steps and consider all 16 categorical features.
dcterms:title: iPinYou
